# init(radius:inclination:azimuth:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Spatial ](/documentation/spatial)

- [ SphericalCoordinates3DFloat ](/documentation/spatial/sphericalcoordinates3dfloat)

- [ init(radius:inclination:azimuth:) ](/documentation/Spatial/SphericalCoordinates3DFloat/init(radius:inclination:azimuth:))

- [ SphericalCoordinates3DFloat ](/documentation/spatial/sphericalcoordinates3dfloat)

-  init(radius:inclination:azimuth:) 

Initializer# init(radius:inclination:azimuth:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
init(
    radius: Float,
    inclination: Angle2DFloat,
    azimuth: Angle2DFloat
)
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/Spatial/SphericalCoordinates3DFloat/init(radius:inclination:azimuth:)#parameters)

`radius`The distance to the origin.

`inclination`The inclination angle.

`azimuth`The azimuthal angle.

## [Return Value](/documentation/Spatial/SphericalCoordinates3DFloat/init(radius:inclination:azimuth:)#return-value)

A new point.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Spatial/SphericalCoordinates3DFloat/init(radius:inclination:azimuth:)#discussion)

Creates a single-precision spherical coordinates structure.
